fr.ecp.IS1220.myVelib.core.statistic

Class StationBalance

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.ecp.IS1220.myVelib.core.statistic.StationBalance

  • public class StationBalance
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a number of methods for computing station-related statistics.
    Author:
    Valentin

      static double occupationRate(Station station)
      This method returns the rate of occupation of a given station from the date of its creation to the present, ie. the sum on each parking slot of the time during which this parking slot has been occupied or offline divided by its total time of existence.

      • occupationRate

        public static double occupationRate(Station station,
                                    Date start,
                                    Date end)
                             throws NoSuchStationExistException
        This method returns the rate of occupation of a given station during a given time window, ie. the sum on each parking slot of the time during which this parking slot has been occupied or offline divided by the total available time.
        This available time is defined as the length of the time window, except for the parking slots which have been created during the time window ; it is then defined as the total time of existence of the parking slot until the end of the time window.
        Parameters:
        station - the station to analyze
        start - start of the time window
        end - end of the time window
        Returns:
        the occupation rate of the station during this time window
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - when there is no data
        NoSuchStationExistException

      • occupationRate

        public static double occupationRate(Station station)
                             throws NoSuchStationExistException
        This method returns the rate of occupation of a given station from the date of its creation to the present, ie. the sum on each parking slot of the time during which this parking slot has been occupied or offline divided by its total time of existence.
        Parameters:
        station - the station to analyze
        Returns:
        the occupation rate of the station during this time window
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - when there is no data
        NoSuchStationExistException
